entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:39 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
